name: minifyall
description: Minifier for JSON, CSS, HTML, XML, TWIG, LESS, SASS, SCSS, JavaScript, JSONC, and JavaScriptReact(testing). Compressor of files and folders. You will love its simplicity!

commands.title: Minify this document and preserve the original ‚õè
Minify the selected document and preserve the original üíé

keybindings.title: Minify this document and preserve the original ‚õè

MinifyAll.disableHexadecimalShortener.description: If you want MinifyAll to stop shortening colors, such as rgb to 3 digit hex, or rgba to hex, or 6 digit hex to 3 digit hex. (True for disabling hex.)

MinifyAll.disableHtml.description: If you want MinifyAll to stop minimizing HTML. (True for disabling)

MinifyAll.disableTwig.description: If you want MinifyAll to stop minimizing TWIG. (True for disabling)

MinifyAll.disableCss.description: If you want MinifyAll to stop minimizing CSS. (True for disabling)

MinifyAll.disableScss.description: If you want MinifyAll to stop minimizing SCSS. (True for disabling)

MinifyAll.disableLess.description: If you want MinifyAll to stop minimizing LESS. (True for disabling)

MinifyAll.disableSass.description: If you want MinifyAll to stop minimizing SASS. (True for disabling)

MinifyAll.disableJson.description: If you want MinifyAll to stop minimizing JSON. (True for disabling)

MinifyAll.disableJsonc.description: If you want MinifyAll to stop minimizing JSONC. (True for disabling)

MinifyAll.disableJavascript.description: If you want MinifyAll to stop minimizing JavaScript. (True for disabling)

MinifyAll.disableJavascriptReact.description: If you want MinifyAll to stop minimizing JavaScriptReact. (True for disabling)

MinifyAll.disablePhp.description: If you want MinifyAll to stop minimizing PHP. (True for disabling)

MinifyAll.disableXml.description: If you want MinifyAll to stop minimizing XML. (True for disabling)

MinifyAll.disableMessages.description: If you want MinifyAll to stop showing error, warning or information messages. (True for disabling)

MinifyAll.disableCodeContextMenu.description: If you want MinifyAll to not showing a context menu when right-clicking in your code. (True for disabling).

MinifyAll.disableFileExplorerContextMenu.description: If you want MinifyAll to not showing a context menu when right-clicking in the file explorer. (True for disabling)..

MinifyAll.minifyOnSave.description: If you want MinifyAll to minify every time you save in the same file. (True for enabling)

MinifyAll.minifyOnSaveToNewFile.description: If you want MinifyAll to minify every time you save in other file. (True for enabling)

MinifyAll.minifyOnSaveToNewFIle.description: [DEPRECATED use 'minifyOnSaveToNewFile' instead]If you want MinifyAll to minify every time you save in other file. (True for enabling)

enumDescriptions: Sets the future filename to example-min.extension
Sets the future filename to example.min.extension
Sets the future filename to example-minified.extension
Sets the future filename to example.minified.extension
MinifyAll.PrefixOfNewMinifiedFiles.description: The prefix of the extension of the new file. Default (-min)

MinifyAll.openMinifiedDocument.description: If you want MinifyAll to open the new minified document after you minify. (False for not opening it every time you create a minified file)

MinifyAll.terserMinifyOptions.description: Terser options, please visit: https://github.com/terser/terser#minify-options for more information.
